page.title: 04SPARE TIME AND LEISURE
page.content: Most of the children in my class play games of all sorts. In our free time we found that{computer games}were the most popular. Several children are keen collectors i.e. stamps, coins and dolls are the most popular in our class. We spend our{leisure time}in different places; girls have ballet lessons, some boys do Karate and Judo. Some of the girls have started bowling which is growing in popularity with all ages in the village. Gardening was the least popular with us but many do spend weekends out ending in having a "bar snack" and a soft drink in a pub. Some of us spend a weekend in a hotel and several have days out at Rhyl and go shopping in Mold and Chester. Some children go to Theatre Clwyd and one or two even have Drama lessons on a Saturday morning.
